Sapphire Ring

Level: 12
--------
Item Level: 66
--------
+22% to Cold Resistance (implicit)
--------
24% increased Cold Damage
+53 to maximum Mana
+13 to Strength
Enemies Chilled by your Hits can be Shattered as though Frozen

A legacy earned
Time and time again
Sing Meginord's song!
